ygData.subject: Re: Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: dont worry about it, you will have enough mana to cast it at lvl 10... its just a part of the game, we start with very low mana when we reach lvl 9 just be
ygData.messageBody:
dont worry about it, you will have enough mana to cast it at lvl 10...
its just a part of the game, we start with very low mana when we reach lvl
9
just be patient for one more lvl =)

----------

> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Pets

> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Clinging Darkness
>

first pet.

have
> this problem?

> Silkke
